languages.text: "Однако, боюсь, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}последствия{/d} операции по выслеживанию повстанцев еще не скоро будут ликвидированы. Флоре, фауне и, главное, нашим агрокомплексам придется восстанавливаться не один десяток лет".

traits.locale_text: "Однако, боюсь, последствия операции по выслеживанию повстанцев еще не скоро будут ликвидированы. Флоре, фауне и, главное, нашим агрокомплексам придется восстанавливаться не один десяток лет".

languages.text: "However, I fear that the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}consequences{/d} of the operation to root out the rebels will be felt for some time yet. The flora and fauna, and, most importantly, our agri-complexes will take decades to recover."
languages.original_text: "Однако, боюсь, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}последствия{/d} операции по выслеживанию повстанцев еще не скоро будут ликвидированы. Флоре, фауне и, главное, нашим агрокомплексам придется восстанавливаться не один десяток лет".

traits.locale_text: "However, I fear that the consequences of the operation to root out the rebels will be felt for some time yet. The flora and fauna, and, most importantly, our agri-complexes will take decades to recover."

"However, I fear that the consequences of the operation to root out the rebels will be felt for some time yet. The flora and fauna, and, most importantly, our agri-complexes will take decades to recover."

"However, I fear that the consequences of the operation to root out the rebels will be felt for some time yet. The flora and fauna, and, most importantly, our agri-complexes will take decades to recover."

"However, I fear that the consequences of the operation to root out the rebels will be felt for some time yet. The flora and fauna, and, most importantly, our agri-complexes will take decades to recover."

languages.text: “不过我担心，消灭叛军带来的{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}影响{/d}，可能还要过一段时间才能真正地显现出来。这里的植物群与动物群，以及更重要的，我们的综合农业中心，可能需要几十年的时间才能恢复原样。”
languages.original_text: "However, I fear that the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}consequences{/d} of the operation to root out the rebels will be felt for some time yet. The flora and fauna, and, most importantly, our agri-complexes will take decades to recover."

traits.locale_text: “不过我担心，消灭叛军带来的影响，可能还要过一段时间才能真正地显现出来。这里的植物群与动物群，以及更重要的，我们的综合农业中心，可能需要几十年的时间才能恢复原样。”

languages.text: «No obstante, me temo que las {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}consecuencias{/d} de la operación para acabar con los rebeldes nos afectarán durante bastante tiempo. La flora y la fauna y, lo que es más importante, nuestros complejos agrícolas, tardarán décadas en recuperarse».
languages.original_text: "However, I fear that the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}consequences{/d} of the operation to root out the rebels will be felt for some time yet. The flora and fauna, and, most importantly, our agri-complexes will take decades to recover."

traits.locale_text: «No obstante, me temo que las consecuencias de la operación para acabar con los rebeldes nos afectarán durante bastante tiempo. La flora y la fauna y, lo que es más importante, nuestros complejos agrícolas, tardarán décadas en recuperarse».

languages.text: 「しかし、反乱軍を掃討する作戦の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}影響{/d}がしばらくしてから現れるのではないかと危惧しています。植物相と動物相もですが、最も重要な点は、農業複合施設の復旧には数十年を要することです」
languages.original_text: "However, I fear that the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}consequences{/d} of the operation to root out the rebels will be felt for some time yet. The flora and fauna, and, most importantly, our agri-complexes will take decades to recover."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、反乱軍を掃討する作戦の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}影響{/d}がしばらくしてから現れるのではないかと危惧しています。植物相と動物相もですが、最も重要な点は、農業複合施設の復旧には数十年を要することです」

languages.text: "Allerdings befürchte ich, dass die {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}Konsequenzen{/d} der Operation zur Beseitigung der Rebellen uns noch einige Zeit begleiten werden. Es wird Jahrzehnte dauern, bis Flora und Fauna und vor allem unsere Agri-Komplexe sich erholt haben."
languages.original_text: "However, I fear that the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}consequences{/d} of the operation to root out the rebels will be felt for some time yet. The flora and fauna, and, most importantly, our agri-complexes will take decades to recover."

traits.locale_text: "Allerdings befürchte ich, dass die Konsequenzen der Operation zur Beseitigung der Rebellen uns noch einige Zeit begleiten werden. Es wird Jahrzehnte dauern, bis Flora und Fauna und vor allem unsere Agri-Komplexe sich erholt haben."

languages.text: « Cependant, je crains que l'opération d'éradication des rebelles ait laissé des {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}séquelles{/d} qui se feront sentir pendant longtemps. Il faudra des dizaines d'années pour que la flore, la faune et surtout nos agri-complexes s'en remettent. »
languages.original_text: "However, I fear that the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}consequences{/d} of the operation to root out the rebels will be felt for some time yet. The flora and fauna, and, most importantly, our agri-complexes will take decades to recover."

traits.locale_text: « Cependant, je crains que l'opération d'éradication des rebelles ait laissé des séquelles qui se feront sentir pendant longtemps. Il faudra des dizaines d'années pour que la flore, la faune et surtout nos agri-complexes s'en remettent. »

languages.text: "Lakin korkarım ki isyancıların kökünü kazımaya yönelik faaliyetlerin {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}sonuçları{/d} bir süre daha hissedilecek. Bitki örtüsü ile hayvanların, en önemlisi ise tarım komplekslerimizin toparlanması on yıllar sürecek."
languages.original_text: "However, I fear that the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}consequences{/d} of the operation to root out the rebels will be felt for some time yet. The flora and fauna, and, most importantly, our agri-complexes will take decades to recover."

traits.locale_text: Lakin korkarım ki isyancıların kökünü kazımaya yönelik faaliyetlerin sonuçları bir süre daha hissedilecek. Bitki örtüsü ile hayvanların, en önemlisi ise tarım komplekslerimizin toparlanması on yıllar sürecek."
